name: Shrug Tides
description:
Enter the natural dreamworld of Shrug Island, and bring back its balance! 

Dive into a magical organic story, explore unique spaces that you transform with, gather the Stones of Balance in each level, and find small revelations in collected shells...

A casual athmospheric platformer for those 5 minutes when you need a breath of ocean air..

Disclaimer: this current version is built for touch screens, so be aware that the controls may not be as optimal with a mouse.(hold mouse click+drag, for swipe control) Thanks for your patience!

For more Shrug stories, please check http://amazumedia.com/shrugs/
